name: Bitcorn
description: Corn is a novel blockchain network built on the Arbitrum Orbit stack, designed to harness Bitcoin's value with Ethereum's computational power. With its hybrid tokenized Bitcoin (BTCN) as its gas token, Corn offers a unique, secure, and sustainable way to maximize Bitcoin's potential. Secured by both Bitcoin (via Babylon) and Ethereum staking, Corn ensures long-term alignment through its innovative popCORN incentives model. Seamless interoperability with other networks is enabled through LayerZero, Thorchain, and Coinbase—making it easy to bring your Bitcoin to Corn and have fun with just one click. Corn is more than efficient; it's the Butter Network: butter yield, butter BTC, and better vibes—the butter place to put your Bitcoin to work.
